text: 6|35|Arau yadi sihamtara upeksa (anagraha) tomara babe kastakara haya tente paraile bhugarbhata suranga athaba akasata jakhala bicarai uliya'i sihamtara babe kono nidarsana lai aha. Arau yadi allahe iccha karailehemtena tente sihamta ata'ike niscaya satpathata ekatraita karailehemtena. Seye tumi murkhasakalara antarbhukta nahaâ€™ba.
